channel.title: Skillcape Emotes
channel.description: Can anyone give me codes for skillcape emotes that won't error my serv? im using hiyascape v2

item.title: Skillcape Emotes
item.dc:creator: @tru3_ki11a2 tru3 ki11a2
item.description:
@tru3_ki11a2 wrote:

Heres something I have on my server.

Add this with your voids

public void capeEmote() {

Now under it, add these:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { startAnimation(2890); txt4 = "99 attack skillcape"; stillgfx(480, absY, absX); string4UpdateRequired = true; }
There “14073” is the cape’s id and change the stillgfx to something you like and you can also change the text if you want it to say something.

You can also go add “sendFrame126(”@yel@S-Cape", 181);" This till make it say S-Cape in your emote tab then go down to where your emotes are and the emote for no, change it to capeEmote() and it should do whatever you have for the cape gfx.

Read full topic
